content: {"name": "Hessco Elder Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "HESSCO provides home-delivered meals to consumers who would otherwise have difficulty getting to one of the congregate meal sites. For those who are determined to be eligible, a hot meal can be delivered between the hours of 10:30 am and 1:00 pm. every day. Others with additional needs may be able to receive a frozen or weekend meal.
